name: The Fanboy's Lament
description:
Yes, yes, it's a day late. So far I'm not doing too hot on this weekly installments. But, in my defense, it is an awful flu season and I was sick and bedridden for most of Wednesday. I should be much better now. Unfortunately, that means that this game as a whole was rushed, and while I thought about just delaying another week to get it into a better condition, I decided it'd be better to just get it out there and put it behind me. So, apologies for this mess.

Also, formatting in Twine is hard

From Idle Thumbs:

Tokyo Game Show and BlizzCon may be over, but they live on in our hearts, and our podcast. Stay awhile and listen for hands-on reports, commentary, and the heart-rending ballad of a once-proud console warrior. This episode probably not sponsored by Gamer Grub.
